title: SILENCE = DEATH
content:
What is the name of the font used in these ACT UP graphics from the late 80's? Not quite Futura Condensed. Identifont was no help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204060323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/silence_equals_death_6383.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204060323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/305_3882.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204060323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aids03_6540.jpg)

This last image is a contemporary photo but looks to be the same font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204060323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1-Banner_4983.jpg)

thanks
author: neologism
